googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Nøt Sûre
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
I spent $400 in August to have 2 10' sections of pipe replaced in an accessible crawlspace.
After a month of low pressure and warm water, I called to ask why they ran 1/2” PEX between two 3/4” pipes, dropping my pressure. He told me to clean my shower head. My next gas bill is 3X as high, and I'm using much more water, and a taller friend who could see the top of the water heater asked why my hot and cold were backwards. Now near the middle of October, I called about this, and when they fixed their reversal, they replaced my pop off valve because it was ragged. I call back in November because my drain is pouring cold water. They come back and replace the pop off and the thermostat saying it had been too high (imagine that: I had to turn the heater up because your idiots were mixing cold into my hot every time I turned it on), but then I told him it is still leaking, and it is still cold, and it is still from the VALVE THAT I SPECIFICALLY TOLD THEM WAS LEAKING AFTER HEARING IT THROUGH A STETHOSCOPE. One final visit, and they cut out the cold water overpressure drain pipe (that blew during the time it was hooked up wrong) and capped off the valve. The cap leaked in spite of the roll and a half of Teflon tape that they tried to squish into place, most not even wrapped in threads, just wrapped around the shank.
If you want a job done right *I* have to do it, I guess. Turns out that the valve has a proprietary fitting, and they just didn't want to pay to do the job right. How's that, Terry, when you charged me $400 to do everything wrong from the beginning? The owner is planning to run for mayor, and let me tell you: he is a perfect fit for the corrupt and crooked council in this town, overcharging for shoddy work, then auctioning off the work to someone else willing to work cheap and skimp on materials.
Calling them is useless. You just have to wait until they call trying to get payment for a half-done job.
I will NEVER do business with this company again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Janice Newman
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: They were great and very helpful
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Hannah White
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
If I could give zero star's I would!

A word of wisdom for ANYBODY living in covington county area. DO NOT use this company!!
I paid this company in full over a thousand dollars in work when I moved into my home to have them replace my breaker panel box. When I had my inspection I was told the main thing I needed to have replaced in the home was that box because it was unsafe for my children and I . I called this company and they came out and worked on it and put a new one in for me.  Long story short the last two days I've been having very strange things happening with my electricity.  My fridge going out, my stove, my lights in my home. My tv turning on and off. I had a another person here working on my kitchen sink and he checked out the inside of the box for me and there's still old original unsafe wiring that I had paid that company to replace still in the box. I called the craig plumbing and electrical company and told him, (his name is Terry) about what was going on. He came about a hour ago checked it out and refused to do anything about it , would not take accountability for it, tried to blame me for the issue's. I'm a single mother with three girl's,  I know nothing about electrical work! That's Why I paid I thought were professionals to fix/ replace the issue.   And no one has touched that box since they worked on it. So I just want to warn people to be careful.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Lori Person
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Best service. Our water heater went out on Saturday evening and we gave them a call off of a Google search and he ( Terry) came on Sunday morning before he went to church, told and showed us the problem. Long story short we had a new water heater installed and functioning before Monday afternoon. Very friendly and job well done. I highly recommend them. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: They did really good work for me, better than you usually get . Super nice guy and his wife ! They've done work for my dad and his neighbor as well . I have zero complaints . They where also extremely courteous. Thanks guys

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Allison Hodgson

googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jess
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
We were told it would be an 8 day job…2 months later it was finished. That’s not the big issue though. The issue is they were paid in full for their job and they never completed it! When I’ve tried contacting them for the refund that TERRY said they would send me back because they couldn’t get out here in time, I hear nothing in return! It’s been almost 2 months since. Check was supposedly sent out but it returned to sender…. Still haven’t seen any $ they owe me back and probably never will. Technically they stole from our family, that’s who your hiring when you call Terry for your plumbing issues. Jeff and Tracey were good when they were here and worked their butts off, my issue is solely with Terry, the owner.
My 2 stars come solely from 1 having plumbing now and 2 Jeff and Tracey being wonderful at their jobs while also being friendly to my kids.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jessica
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Not only was Jeff early but he was thorough. He found a significant water line blockage which caused leaks and flooding when using the washing machine. Jeff took his time and with patience, determination and skill removed the blockage and repaired the lines, hoses, clamps and valves. I highly recommend Craig Plumbing & Electrical - Jeff and Terry are customer service oriented, professional, personable, experienced, efficient and economical. I appreciate and thank them both for the outstanding work they provided.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Val
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Great work very professional installed bathtub

Did a great job
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Juliana McMullin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very professional and courteous. When they needed to reschedule because of the weather, they left me a note on my door so I'd know to call them. That scored major points in my book, pet peeve is contractors who are no show/no call/don't RETURN calls. When the day came, they were on time, and when they came across unexpected snafus they dealt with it at the same price they had quoted me originally. Also (mostly) cleaned up after themselves, didn't leave a huge mess for me to deal with. I've been recommending them to everyone I know, and will be calling them back for more work that needs to be done.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Hung Nguyen
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
They were called out for an emergency job that took less than 3 hours and a single pipe. When asked for an itemized invoice they refused and then threatened litigation over their pay when that was not what was being debated. They aren't interested in accommodating their customer's clerical needs, but their plumbing ones. The pvc pipe they glued in is still working and they assure me they'll repair it if it fails but I doubt they could have messed up gluing a pvc pipe. However I didn't expect them to be incapable of providing an itemized receipt so they definitely surprised me.

Worth considering alternative providers.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Craig Plumbing and Electrical

plumberResearchFull.json:
## Business Information:

### Alabama Business Registration/License Details
- Craig Plumbing and Electrical is registered and operates under the oversight of the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board and the Alabama Electrical Contractors Board. The business must comply with the licensing requirements of these boards[1].

### Physical Location and Service Areas
- The business is located at 1028 S Cotton St, Andalusia, AL 36420-4937. Although the primary address listed is on Cotton St, another source mentions an address at 14519 Cottonwood Dr, Andalusia, AL 36420[1][4].

### Hours and Payment Methods
- There is no specific information available on the business hours or payment methods. However, it is common for such services to offer various payment options including cash, credit cards, and checks.

### Years in Operation
- Craig Plumbing and Electrical has been in business since January 10, 1981, making it over 44 years in operation[1].

## Services & Specialties:

### Types of Services Offered
- The business offers a wide range of services including plumbing, electrical work, drywall repairs, roofing repairs, flooring repairs, and more. Specific services include interior trim and moldings installation and repair, deck or porch repair, interior and exterior door installation, and various plumbing and electrical tasks[2].

### Service Areas Covered
- The service area is primarily around Andalusia, Alabama, though the exact geographic scope of their services is not detailed.

### Emergency Service Availability
- While there is no explicit mention of 24/7 emergency services, customer reviews indicate that the business is responsive to urgent needs, such as fixing a leaking kitchen tap or a non-functional toilet[3].

### Any Listed Prices or Rates
- There is no detailed pricing information available. However, customers have mentioned that the prices are fair and offer good value for the services provided[3].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

### Review Summaries with Specific Examples
- Customers have praised the business for its professionalism, punctuality, and customer satisfaction. Examples include prompt and efficient service for electrical inspections (EICR), fixing a leaking radiator, and replacing a toilet unit. Customers have also appreciated the thoroughness and tidiness of the work done[3].

### BBB Rating and Status
- Craig Plumbing and Electrical is not a BBB Accredited Business but has an A+ BBB rating. The business has been listed with the BBB since September 24, 2018[1].

### Common Customer Feedback Themes
- Common themes include praise for the owner's friendliness, professionalism, and reliability. Customers have also highlighted the business's ability to complete jobs efficiently and to a high standard[3].

### Response to Reviews
- There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews, as the sources provided do not include any responses from the business owner.

## Owner & Staff:

### Owner/Management Information
- The business is owned by Mr. Terry Craig, who is also the primary contact for customer inquiries and services[1].

### Staff Qualifications
- There is no detailed information available on the qualifications of the staff beyond the owner. However, customer reviews suggest that the staff, including individuals like Mark, are knowledgeable and professional[3].

### Professional Certifications
- The business operates under the necessary state licenses from the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board and the Alabama Electrical Contractors Board, indicating that the owner and staff have the required professional certifications[1].
aboutUs: Craig Plumbing and Electrical is a locally owned and operated service provider, offering comprehensive plumbing, electrical, and home repair solutions to residents in and around Andalusia, Alabama. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in a wide range of services, from intricate plumbing installations to complex electrical work, ensuring your home or business receives the highest quality service.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Trusted local experts delivering reliable, efficient, and code-compliant plumbing and electrical services.
sellingPoints: State-licensed and insured professionals adhering to the highest industry standards.
Prompt response times and flexible scheduling to accommodate your needs.
Meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to leaving your property clean and tidy.
